submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, a: List[int], b: List[int]) -> int:
        a.append(0)
        b.append(0)
        a.sort()
        b.sort()
        c = [*accumulate(a)]
        d = [*accumulate(b)]
        r = 0
        while len(a) > 1 or len(b) > 1:
            if a[-1] < b[-1]:
                a, b, c, d = b, a, d, c
            c.pop()
            r += a.pop() + d[-1]
        return r
